contexts.context: ...now, and couldn't afford a visit this year. Next <mark>summer</mark>, if my job is sorted out, I would...
...very much like to come over again. This past <mark>summer</mark> I tried ringing you a few times at 4217175...
...nothing but work on it for a year. My <mark>"summer"</mark> trip to England got postponed to November while I...
...reported)? I had an Austrian student here this <mark>summer</mark> working on Wystan, and I wanted to tell...
...home. He was at Kirchstette not only during the <mark>summer</mark>, as is often said, but with interruptions for...
...hope this finds you in good spirits and that <mark>Summer</mark> is better behaved in Austria than it is here...
